metadata.synopsis:
Alternate version of the dragon rider scene at chokepoint. Lae'zel is alive and was never recruited. Player can recruit her after this.

Lae'zel approaches the rider to discover where to find the creche. A cure for the tadpole can be found there - or so she believes. However, the knight is under different orders.

28.speaker: Lae'zel
28.text: Stay put, and keep your lips sealed.
28.context: InternalNodeContext: Edge-case: Lae'zel failed to be re-added automatically to the party because the party was full. Normally, she is readded and her OM plays instead of this dialog.

38.speaker: Lae'zel
38.text: Rider - my time is short. Lead me to...
38.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel begins to bow as she speaks to the kith'rak

43.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
43.text: Were I not merciful, I would slice the skin clean from your meat.

5.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
5.text: Yet you are not bleeding. For I am nothing if not merciful.

77.speaker: Lae'zel
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Laezel, martial bowNodeContext: Lae'zel stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak

54.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
54.text: You will call me Jhe'stil Kith'rak.
54.context: NodeContext: zhe-STIL KITH-rack. (First consonant like the first letter of 'Jacque'.)

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: Voss, Knight Supreme. The queen's silver, the queen's sword.

6.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
6.text: A ghaik vessel has fallen from the sky, Lae'zel. Thieves aboard have taken a weapon most precious.

34.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
34.text: It is polyhedric in shape, and inscribed with the sacred runes of our people.

70.speaker: Narrator
70.text: *You feel Shadowheart's anxiety. The weapon that Voss seeks is the same one the Absolute's followers are hunting - it's the artefact that she carries.*
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steals a glance to Tav, her expression tight, apprehensive. The image of her undulates slightly - a mindmeld.InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

4.speaker: Narrator
4.text: *Her mind focuses - the giths' suspicion cannot be aroused. They cannot discover that the weapon they seek is right within their grasp.*
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's eyes flick over to the hobgoblin.

27.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
27.text: Take word to your crèche. You are to join our search.

44.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
44.text: Speak up, child. Affirm your mandate.

17.speaker: Lae'zel
17.text: My mandate, Jhe'stil Kith'rak, is to locate this crèche. I was infected aboard a ghaik ship and need to be purified. Your mandate is to aid me.
17.context: NodeContext: Snotty and confident, stays bowed as she speaks to the kith'rak

66.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
66.text: Purified? Oh, Lae'zel - why must the truth be so bitter? Soon, your skin will go grey, and your blood will run silver. You will shed your skin to become ghaik.

20.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
20.text: Only in death are the infected cleansed.

21.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
21.text: But... you were on the nautiloid. You possess what I seek.

7.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
7.text: You will give it to us. Then you will bend your head for the sword.

60.speaker: Lae'zel
60.text: Stand down, knight. I do not have what you seek!
60.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the kith'rak.

55.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
55.text: Baretha - see her skull split and her corpse examined. I will take word to Queen Vlaakith - our quest has ended.

36.speaker: Narrator
36.text: *A current of deception carries Voss' words. Wherever he flies, it is not to Vlaakith.*

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Produce the artefact. You're looking for this, I take it?

51.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
51.text: Our thieves come forth, Baretha. Did you imagine such fortune?

32.speaker: Lae'zel
32.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

56.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
56.text: You will give us the weapon. Then you will bend your head for the sword.

2.speaker: Lae'zel
2.text: Never. Vlaakith demands my purity, Kith'rak. I was infected aboard the ghaik ship. By protocol, you must aid me.

57.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
57.text: Baretha, see that her skull is split and the weapon collected, on Vlaakith's command. I will take word to the Undying Queen - our quest has ended.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: I have my own mandate. Time to die, gith.

73.speaker: Lae'zel
73.text: What? Half-wit! I have not suffered for you to deny me!
73.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

47.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
47.text: Baretha - see their skulls split and their corpses examined. I must fly to our Undying Queen.

72.speaker: Narrator
72.text: *You feel Shadowheart's anxiety. The weapon that Voss seeks - it's the artefact that she carries.*
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steals a glance to Tav, her expression tight, apprehensive. The image of her undulates slightly - a mindmeld.

75.speaker: Narrator
75.text: *You realise that the weapon Voss speaks of is the gith artefact you carry. You must keep it from him, just as you must keep it from the Absolute.*
75.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *You realise that the weapon Voss speaks of is the gith artefact you carry. You cannot let him discover it - no matter what.*

12.speaker: Narrator
12.text: *You suddenly feel a strange anxiety take hold - not your own, but that of the artefact you carry. Somehow, it's afraid...*
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player glances to their side, as if sensing the box

15.speaker: Narrator
15.text: *You attune your mind to it. The artefact does not want to fall into the gith raiders' hands any more than it does the Absolute followers'.*
15.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the 'find the weapon' beat was previously delivered by Dror Ragzlin

13.speaker: Narrator
13.text: *You attune your mind to it. The artefact does not want to part from you. It does not want to fall into the gith raiders' hands.*

9.speaker: Player
9.text: If you wish to speak, speak to me.

74.speaker: Lae'zel
74.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

26.speaker: Player
26.text: Step forward and state your own name.

24.speaker: Lae'zel
24.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel looks up from bowing at the player in anger

65.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
65.text: Now, now - Vlaakith esteems all her children.

42.speaker: Narrator
42.text: *Your skull pounds in response to the githyanki's white-hot stare. Her lips don't move, yet you hear her voice.*

14.speaker: Lae'zel
14.text: You. Stay put, and keep your lips sealed.

48.speaker: Lae'zel
48.text: You. Stay put, and keep your lips sealed.
